name: coinview
description: * What is binance and how does it compare to other exchanges?  * Why crypto? Open on nights and weekends, learn new things by doing * wscat - connect to websocket from the command line * wss://stream.binance.com:9443/ws/btcusdt@trade * capture output to a file * connect to websocket from the Web / JavaScript * Lightweight Charts - create real-time candlestick chart similar to TradingView * UI for to check indicators (eg. RSI), configure values, configure alerts/nofications
